scripts.build: npm run cleanDist && npx tsc --project tsconfig.ifd.json && shx cp ./src/package.json ./tmp/ && node --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node tmp/index_ifd.js && npm run cleanTmp && node ./esbuild.config.js
scripts.build:debug: npm run cleanDist && npx tsc --project tsconfig.ifd.json && shx cp ./src/package.json ./tmp/ && node --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node tmp/index_ifd.js && npm run cleanTmp && node ./esbuild.config.js --development
